Room.Name: Center Courtyard North
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the main assembly floor for the fighting forces of Castle Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: It is here that troops are called to muster every morning, and once a month an inspection of the fighting men and women takes place. The inspection is generally a lot of pomp and ceremony, but woe to the soldier who doesn't pass. A week in the castle's dungeon with only water and crusty bread is no fun. Further to the south is the review stand and the drummer's kiosk.
